titleStmt.title: Articles of peace between the most serene and mighty Prince William the Third, King of Great-Britain, and the most serene and mighty Prince Lewis the Fourteenth the most Christian King, concluded in the Royal Pallace at Ryswicke the 10/20. day of September, 1697.
